chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
Y: Type
A: list X
f: X -> Y

Goal:
(forall x y : X, x el A -> y el A -> f x = f y -> x = y) -> dupfree A -> dupfree (map f A)

Premises:
dupfree : forall X : Type, list X -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
map_injective : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), (forall x y : X, f x = f y -> x = y) -> forall xs ys : list X, map f xs = map f ys -> xs = ys
dupfree_ind : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (x : X) (A : list X), ~ x el A -> dupfree A -> P A -> P (x :: A)) -> forall l : list X, dupfree l -> P l
dupfree_sind : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> SProp), P [] -> (forall (x : X) (A : list X), ~ x el A -> dupfree A -> P A -> P (x :: A)) -> forall l : list X, dupfree l -> P l
dupfreeC : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A : list X), ~ x el A -> dupfree A -> dupfree (x :: A)
list_exists_DM : forall (X : Type) (A : list X) (p : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> ~ (forall x : X, x el A -> ~ p x) -> exists x : X, x el A /\ p x
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), y el map f l < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ x el l)
in_cons_neq : forall (X : Type) (x y : X) (A : list X), x el y :: A -> x <> y -> x el A
rem_neq : forall (X : eqType) (x y : X) (A : list X), x <> y -> x el A -> x el rem A y
in_flat_map_Exists : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (x : B) (l : list A), x el flat_map f l < -> Exists (fun y : A => x el f y) l
in_flat_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (l : list A) (y : B), y el flat_map f l < -> (exists x : A, x el l /\ y el f x)
in_in_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x <> y -> x el l -> x el remove eq_dec y l
list_cc : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> Prop) (A : list X), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> (exists x : X, x el A /\ p x) -> {x : X | x el A /\ p x}
filter_id : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> bool) (A : list X), (forall x : X, x el A -> p x) -> filter p A = A
map_eq_cons : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (xs : list A) (y : B) (ys : list B), map f xs = y :: ys -> exists (x : A) (xs' : list A), xs = x :: xs' /\ y = f x /\ ys = map f xs'
map_eq_cons' : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (xs : list A) (y : B) (ys : list B), y :: ys = map f xs -> exists (x : A) (xs' : list A), xs = x :: xs' /\ y = f x /\ ys = map f xs'
notin_flat_map_Forall : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (x : B) (l : list A), ~ x el flat_map f l < -> Forall (fun y : A => ~ x el f y) l
filter_pq_eq : forall (X : Type) (p q : X -> bool) (A : list X), (forall x : X, x el A -> p x = q x) -> filter p A = filter q A
filter_pq_mono : forall (X : Type) (p q : X -> bool) (A : list X), (forall x : X, x el A -> p x -> q x) -> filter p A <<= filter q A
remove : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> A -> list A -> list A
rem_not_in : forall (X : eqType) (x y : X) (A : list X), x = y \/ ~ x el A -> ~ x el rem A y
count_occ : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> A -> nat
list_exists_dec : forall (X : Type) (A : list X) (p : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> dec (exists x : X, x el A /\ p x)
in_prod : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), x el l -> y el l' -> (x, y) el list_prod l l'
nodup : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> list A
in_elt_inv : forall (A : Type) (x y : A) (l1 l2 : list A), x el l1 ++ y :: l2 -> x = y \/ x el l1 ++ l2
not_in_cons : forall (X : Type) (x y : X) (A : list X), ~ x el y :: A -> x <> y /\ ~ x el A
dupfree_app : forall A B, disjoint A B -> dupfree A -> dupfree B -> dupfree (A ++ B)
find_none : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), find f l = None -> forall x : A, x el l -> f x = false
in_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x el remove eq_dec y l -> x el l /\ x <> y
filter_map : forall (X Y : Type) (p : Y -> bool) (f : X -> Y) (A : list X), filter p (map f A) = map f (filter (fun x : X => p (f x)) A)
cfind : forall (A0 : list ?X) (p : ?X -> Prop), (forall x : ?X, dec (p x)) -> {x : ?X | x el A0 /\ p x} + {forall x : ?X, x el A0 -> ~ p x} where ?X : [X : Type Y : Type A : list X f : X -> Y |- Type]
find_some : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A) (x : A), find f l = Some x -> x el l /\ f x = true
in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (x : A), x el l -> f x el map f l
Forall_image : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list B), Forall (fun y : B => exists x : A, y = f x) l < -> (exists l' : list A, l = map f l')
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, a el ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type A : list X f : X -> Y |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type A : list X f : X -> Y |- Type] ?f : [X : Type Y : Type A : list X f : X -> Y |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [X : Type Y : Type A : list X f : X -> Y |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [X : Type Y : Type A : list X f : X -> Y |- list ?A]
filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : list A), x el filter f l < -> x el l /\ f x = true
in_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {a el l} + {~ a el l}
disjoint_forall : forall (X : Type) (A B : list X), disjoint A B < -> (forall x : X, x el A -> ~ x el B)
elements_in_partition : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> forall x : A, x el l < -> x el l1 \/ x el l2
filter_ext_in : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), (forall a : A, a el l -> f a = g a) -> filter f l = filter g l

intros x y H1 H2 H3.
intros H4.
induction H4 as [|h t H4' IH].
- simpl. apply dupfreeC. intros H5 H6. apply H4'.
- simpl. apply dupfreeC. intros H5 H6. apply IHH4. apply H3. auto. apply H4'.
```
